item.title: Markdown Test
item.description: Markdown Syntax Examples A Subheadings Emphasis Bold Text Italic Text Lists Ordered List Item 1 Ordered List Item 2 Subitem 1 Subitem 2 Unordered List Item 1 Unordered List Item 2 Links and Images OpenAI Blockquotes This is a blockquote. Horizontal Rule Code Blocks C++ Code Block #include <iostream> int main() { std::cout << "Hello, world!" << std::endl; return 0; } Python Code Block def greet(name): print(f"Hello, {name}!") greet("Alice")
